list.name: Changes
list.comment: * sidebar.pug // Number of unseen notifications will now be shown beside the notification tab.

task.summary: Default task
* sidebar.pug // Fixed a bug where all sidebar buttons are showing despite having null privileges
* viewforms.pug // Made all available forms tabular for easier accessibility
* formview.pug // Now shows date submitted for the form instead of date saved
* intellijent.users.json // Added the necessary users for proper system flow soon
* formview.pug // Fixed update status for Viewing Submitted Forms
* index.js // Possible fix for back history to properly update table in view form templates, BUT could pose possible draw backs.
* index.js // Users will also now be notified if they have been assigned to a form or unassigned
* sidebar.pug // Fixed a stupid bug
* sidebar.pug // Number of unseen notifications will now be shown beside the notification tab.
